TopicTitle: The Procrastinaut Space Program - The Re-launch

Articles.Content:
Hey guys!!

Its that time again where I flood the interwebs to promote my videos, recent goings on within the channel have forced me to relocate what was once 7000 subscribers is only a mere 1000 so with that said its time to get the numbers back up.

For those of you who don't know who I am, my name is Pleborian. I'm part of the KSP media group, I write a section for the KSP weekly and I have a frikken MASSIVE series on youtube that is dedicated to those little green fiends we all know and love. You can find my latest episode here:

There's lots to see and do on my channel, if you enjoy it why not hit that subscribe button that way you can be the first to know when a brand new episode is released.

anyways, thanks for taking the time to read this wall of text, remember to say hi if you fancy stopping by
I really enjoy your work and its good to see some videos again.

I honestly never did have time to watch them, but you desereved the sub.

Good time to catch up!

I would love it if someone were to do a youtube series on the campaigns I helped draft here:

http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Campaigns

I would love it if someone were to do a youtube series on the campaigns I helped draft here:

http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Campaigns

im currently using the mission controller mod, and looking at some of those missions it seems the mod creator has made them in a similar style to that

The other day, I subscribed to the new channel as soon as I saw it. It was interesting seeing those old episodes from long ago. Anyway, I emailed you a flag! Hope you can get it to place in the correct direction! Love your videos mate.

Edited June 28, 2013 by AustralianFries
just thought I would post todays episode here, think i'll dump every other episode on the forums you never know who is watching

been neglecting this thread AGAIN!!! I always do this, anyways heres the episodes up to today:

todays should be going live anytime soon, so remember to hit the channel and subscribe
